channel.title: Runescape classic private server Feature
channel.description:
hey guys i'm associated with developing a new private server and i want your opinions on certain features including this.
Would you like pray and hp recharged after you kill someone in willd* * this is to help someone defend against pjers* and also gives an incentive to killing someone just a thought! let me know what you think

item.title: Runescape classic private server Feature
item.dc:creator: @da_real_hype da real hype
item.description:
@da_real_hype wrote:

takes the fun away from pking. pjing was ment to give the guy with the lower stats a chance (like 99 1 99 vs 2 people with 40 1 70) the 99 1 99 would prolly 3 hit both of them but with pjing gives them a chance

Read full topic

item.title: Runescape classic private server Feature
item.dc:creator: @fran_ta_the_brah fran ta the brah
item.description:
@fran_ta_the_brah wrote:

would be sick but when a server just starts and the person with r2h is pking he will never lose it cuz he would just pk a noob and recharge prayer at an extent yes it shoul dbe but not full

Read full topic

item.title: Runescape classic private server Feature
item.dc:creator: @Jusba Jusba
item.description:
@Jusba wrote:

Very interesting idea. I wouldn’t smash it instantly, rather give it a beta test.
If this was to be tested lets say in rsce I wouldn’t agree with the prayer recharge since all the altars are one teleport away. In rsc tho I’d love it. It would feel so rewarding to get full prayer after a kill because you wouldn’t have to walk to monks.

Hp recharge would change pking quite a lot so I’d have that tested. This CANNOT!!! be done in a server with portals in wild. I can see the bastards in rsce bring low hp accounts to castle so they would get full hp in a tense situation. ~20% Regeneration could work. Can’t see anyone bothering to abuse it for such a small advantage.

Read full topic

item.title: Runescape classic private server Feature
item.dc:creator: @oldy oldy
item.description:
@oldy wrote:

latifundio:

But i think it should be related to the opponent cb level. I mean if i pk spmeone with 10 lvls lower i should not be getting a full hp restore. Maybe 50% if cb level is the same between both? if the kill is lower then decrease and if higher then increase the %.

This. Or only hp regenned if there is a character within 5 sqs of your character once a kill is made. (if main objective is to curb pjing)

Read full topic

Wow ive never thought of that to prevent pjing b4, seems so obvious. HP regened but not prayer to full though, perhaps 20% recharged?
